citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 PM on
16-AUG-17.
* Inspector called telephone numbers given by the licensee. Licensee texted message saying they were involved
in a conference call at work and would not be available to do a facility inspection. I texted back asking about
possibility of the facility representative conducting a facility inspection. Licensee texted message back saying the
representative would not be available to do a facility inspection as well.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:00 PM on
16-AUG-17.
*  Inspector called telephone numbers given by the licensee.  Licensee texted message saying they were involved
in a conference call at work and would not be available to do a facility inspection.  I texted back asking about
possibility of  the facility representative conducting a facility inspection.  Licensee texted message back saying the
representative would not be available to do a facility inspection as well.   
*  Copy of inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
